articles.title: Schoolchildren's Performance Given on Lunar New Year's Day
articles.content:
Schoolchildren's Performance Given on Lunar New Year's Day
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A lunar New Year's performance of schoolchildren "Blessing of Sun" took place at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace here on Sunday.
					Enjoying the performance were leading officials of party, state and army, including Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and Choe Ryong Hae, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, persons of merits and Pyongyangites.
					
					Present there on invitation were the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, overseas Koreans, couples of diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations and members of the military attaches corps here. 
					
					The performance began with prologue "We make lunar New Year's bows to Marshal Kim Jong Un". 
					
					The performance included numbers like fairy tale "New Year's performance in star country", trio and chorus "We Are Happy under Care of Marshal Kim Il Sung" and duet and chorus "Let us sing louder song of General Kim Jong Il".
					
					The performers highly praised the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as eternal sun who devoted their all to the rising generation, calling children as the king of the country. 
					
					Stage for true stories "Thank you, Marshal Kim Jong Un", music and dance of Korean schoolchildren in Japan "Our country led by Marshal is best", national instrumental music and song "Flower gate of happiness" and other numbers sang of the great and kind embrace of the father.
					
					They vividly depicted the bright appearance of schoolchildren growing up to be kid doctors, talents and soldiers under the blue sky of the country. 
					
					Small chorus of immortal classic masterpiece "We Will Carry Forward the March that Started on Mt. Paektu", piano and chorus "Let's Learn for Thriving Korea" reflecting the pledge of schoolchildren loudly resounded throughout the hall.

articles.title: Kim Kum Sok, Schoolboy Blessed with Kim Jong Un's Loving Care
articles.content:
Kim Kum Sok, Schoolboy Blessed with Kim Jong Un's Loving Care
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Schoolchildren's performance "Blessing of the Sun" took place here on the lunar New Year's Day.
					Among the performers was Kim Kum Sok, a 14-year-old student of the Chongchongang Secondary School in Anju City, South Phyongan Province.
					
					He has no mother and his father has served a prison term from a few years ago.
					
					Kim told KCNA:
					
					"For my top school records, I was unexpectedly selected as a delegate to the celebrations of the 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union held in Pyongyang in June last year.
					
					Prior to departure for Pyongyang, I went to a hospital where my mother was staying for critical illness to say goodbye to her. My mother was in tears. Later she died. It was so sorrowful for me.
					
					But I did not know that respected Marshal Kim Jong Un was informed of the fact. Back home from the celebrations in Pyongyang, I was told by officials that he took a measure to look after me with all sincerity."
					
					Kim Kum Sok is now living with his 17-year-old sister. They are under the care of villagers, teachers and city officials.
					
					In a true-story telling "Thank you, Marshal Kim Jong Un" for the performance, Kim said:
					
					"Mama, don't worry about me. Marshal Kim Jong Un is now taking warm care of me.
					
					He brought my dream into reality. His care is parental love."

articles.title: Kimjongilia Recognized as King of Flowers
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Recognized as King of Flowers
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The immortal flower, Kimjongilia, has been disseminated in at least 70 countries over the past 25 years thanks to the deep respect and sincere efforts of the world progressive people.
					During that period, lots of organizations for disseminating the flower were formed and more than 100 shows held.
					
					Kimjongilia cultivated by Japanese horticulturist Motoderu Kamo in February, Juche 77(1988) caused a great sensation at international horticultural shows after its appearance. The flower was awarded top prizes there, being recognized as the king of flowers.
					
					Motoderu Kamo, when visiting the DPRK, an ideal society for humankind, was completely fascinated by the great personality of leader Kim Jong Il possessed of ardent love for the people. He considered it as his lifetime goal to breed a flower named after him.
					
					The appearance of the flower he imagined before its breeding was as follows:
					
					1. It should look like a spectacular and majestic double flower appropriate to the authority of a peerless great man and kind-hearted statesman.
					
					2. It should have a red color like the sun and an attractive plump shape appropriate to the personality of a hero produced by the century.
					
					3. Its stalk should have a strong and straight dignified shape befitting the staunch spirit of a great leader.
					
					4. Its leaves should look like a green heart appropriate to the personality of a great man.
					
					He devoted his soul and passion to breeding the flower of beautiful Begonia family for over 20 years. In February 1988, he presented the flower to Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his birthday.
					
					As soon as Kimjongilia appeared, it became a world-famous flower.
					
					69 countries and 26 international organizations took part in the 1999 Kunming International Horticultural Expo of China, the biggest- ever flower show in the world, held in May 1999 where flowers of more than 2,400 species were displayed. Grand Prix and diploma, the highest prize, were awarded to Kimjongilia.
					
					The International Society for Horticultural Science officially registered the world-startling Kimjongilia as new species No. 991 belonging to the Begonia family. 
					
					Kimjongilia is blooming day by day as the famous flower thanks to warm admiration and love of world progressives.
					
					Newspapers, agencies, radios and TV broadcasting services of more than 100 countries including China, Russia and Cuba made wide coverage of the background against which the flower was bred, its biological character and public reactions to it.
					
					The U.S. Institute for Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Studies said in its Internet website that Kimjongilia reflects the traits of the peerlessly great man, the representative of human being's beautiful feelings and aspiration like justice and truth, independence and revolution, love and ardor, happiness and prosperity, peace and future.

articles.title: Mokran Bookshop Bustling with Citizens
articles.content:
Mokran Bookshop Bustling with Citizens
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- On the occasion of the lunar New Year's Day, the Mokran Bookshop in Changjon Street here has bustled with citizens.
					Put on sale at the shop are copies of "Collection of World's Famous Tales for Children", books on cooking, medicine and other common knowledge and various kinds of greeting cards.
					
					Ryu Su Ryon, manager of the bookshop, told KCNA:
					
					Best seller here at present is greeting cards, made in various forms and styles to meet the demands of people.
					
					It is a custom of the Korean people to exchange greetings, cards and gifts with each other on the lunar New Year's Day. Contained in those cards are wishes for good health, happiness and success.
					
					Most popular of the cards are those featuring landscapes of the country.
					
					Such practice well shows the noble etiquette and morality of the Korean people.
					
					The bookshop is always crowed with customers, not only in major holidays but also in ordinary days.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces U.S. Blackmail against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces U.S. Blackmail against DPRK
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the nuclear-powered submarine San Francisco belonging to the U.S 11th Flotilla and Aegis cruiser Shiloh staged joint anti-submarine exercises in the East Sea of Korea with south Korean puppet forces. What must not go unnoticed is that the U.S. imperialists opened to media even the interior of the nuclear submarine equipped with Tomahawk cruise missiles, kicking up hysteria.
					Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					The recent saber-rattling of the U.S. imperialists is an expression of their intention to invade the DPRK by leaving no means untried in the event of "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula. It was an open threat and military blackmail against it.
					
					Timed to coincide with this, a nuclear-powered carrier belonging to the U.S. 7th Fleet is operating in the waters off the peninsula.
					
					The situation goes to clearly prove that their dangerous scenario to ignite a nuclear war on the peninsula at any cost is being put into practice.
					
					These warmongers, however, have the impudence to talk about "possibility of provocation" from someone and "message of strong warning." 
					
					They kicked up such military racket, taken aback by the bomb-like declaration of an all-out action taken by the DPRK to counter the UNSC "resolution on sanctions" against it over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes. This was a revelation of pusillanimity and persecution mania.
					
					The army and the people of the DPRK are not frightened by such "demonstration of armed forces".
					
					If the U.S. dares commit a reckless provocation while looking down on the DPRK, obsessed with megalomania about its military muscle, the army and the people of the DPRK will never miss a golden chance but wipe out the aggressors to the last man.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns S. Korean Regime against Its Scenario for Pre-emptive Strike on DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns S. Korean Regime against Its Scenario for Pre-emptive Strike on DPRK
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean "Ministry of Defense" recently called for "developing concrete, substantial and definite strategy" to cope with the "the north's potential nuclear threat" and declared that the conception of "pre-emptive attack" would be included in the "strategy of nuclear deterrence against the north" to be worked out with the U.S.
					Jong Sung Jo, chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, blustered in case of "any sign of the north's nuclear strike", the south Korean military would "mount a pre-emptive attack on it even though it might lead to a war".
					
					Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: The south Korean Lee Myung Bak regime's call for "pre-emptive attack" proves that it made a nuclear pre-emptive strike on the DPRK an established fact and is working hard in real earnest to  put into practice the war scenario against the DPRK in collusion with the U.S.
					
					The commentary went on:
					
					The south Korean regime has stepped up the development and deployment of ballistic missiles with a firing range of 800km capable of striking the entire region of the DPRK as well as the deployment of Aegis destroyer's ship-to-ground cruise missile with a firing range of 500km and a long-range air-to-ground missile for fighters.
					
					In another development, the south Korean regime is mulling having access to a spy satellite capable of monitoring core facilities in the rear of the north with an investment of a huge amount of money, talking about "independent capability to monitor it."
					
					The Lee regime is talkative about "the north's potential nuclear threat," but this is nothing but sheer sophism to cover up its sinister hostile actions against the DPRK.
					
					It is ridiculous, indeed, for the south Korean authorities to make desperate efforts to mount a pre-emptive attack on the DPRK backed by the U.S.
					
					As the saying goes "A newborn puppy knows no fear of a tiger", the Lee regime's attempt at "a pre-emptive strike on the north" would only herald its final destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Denounced for Imposing Heavy Penalties on Pro-reunification Activists
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Denounced for Imposing Heavy Penalties on Pro-reunification Activists
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification on Feb. 8 held a press conference in Seoul to condemn the south Korean regime's reckless moves against national reunification.
					At the conference the Headquarters accused the Seoul Central District Court of staging a trial at which it sentenced Vice-Chairman Ro Su Hui and Secretary General Won Jin Uk of the Headquarters to 4 and 3 years in prison and the same term of suspension of qualification respectively.
					
					Ro's visit to the north was prompted by his will to express profound condolences over the great loss to the compatriots and share sorrow with them in a bid to pave the way for national conciliation, unity and reunification, the organization noted.
					
					The court took such actions, accusing him of his visit to Pyongyang though his behavior was entirely just in the light of human ethics and morality and traditional beautiful manners and customs of the nation and from the standpoint of national reconciliation and unity. 
					
					The authorities will never escape a judgment by history for taking such harsh legal actions, it warned.
					
					Strongly protesting this ruling, it urged the "government" authorities to immediately release its vice-chairman and secretary general.

articles.title: U.S. Anti-DPRK "Sanctions" Racket Denounced by Korean in Germany
articles.content:
U.S. Anti-DPRK "Sanctions" Racket Denounced by Korean in Germany
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Ri Jun Sik, a Korean in Germany, made public a poem supporting the resolute stand of the DPRK to denounce the U.S. and its allies' "sanctions" racket against it.
					The DPRK clarified in the statements of its National Defence Commission and Ministry of Foreign Affairs that it would turn out in an all-out action to protect the country's sovereignty, he noted in his poem.
					
					The DPRK clearly showed how Songun Korea will exercise its just sovereignty against the U.S., an empire of evils, and its servants busy conducting outrageous and unjust arbitrary actions by abusing the UN Security Council, the poem said, adding:
					
					The world conscience that loves justice and truth is voicing full support and solidarity for the DPRK's stance.
					
					It is nothing but brigandish sophism devoid of any justification and persuasive power for the U.S. and its allies to insist that only the DPRK is not allowed to exercise the right to use space for peaceful purposes though it is commonly granted to all countries in the world.
					
					The world chides and ridicules the U.S. keen to stifle socialist Korea of Juche.

articles.title: U.S. Moves to Hold Military Hegemony under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Moves to Hold Military Hegemony under Fire
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The United States recently staged a third-phase test of interceptor missile at an air force base in California and opened to public related data with video footages.
					Minju Joson Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: This indicates that the U.S. is keen to use the test as a means for posing a military threat to the DPRK and maximize its effect.
					
					The U.S. is working hard to realize its strategy for world domination by force under the pretext of the DPRK's non-existent "missile threat, " the commentary notes, adding:
					
					The keynote of the U.S. strategy is to maintain an edge in the field of strategic offensive weapons and secure a posture for preemptive attack based on it.
					
					The essence of the missile test was to disable the deterrence of other countries in the field of the strategic offensive weapons and secure a capability for mounting a preemptive attack any time in a bid to put the world under its control as it pleases. 
					
					The U.S. scenario for preemptive strike at other countries has assumed more dangerous nature and found its way to various fields recently.
					
					This is clearly evidenced by the fact that the U.S. is set to develop the cyber command into a cyber force with offensive capability.
					
					This indicates that the U.S. leaves no stone unturned to hold military hegemony.
					
					It is trying hard to browbeat the DPRK by dint of force and high-handed practices, but this is nothing but a reckless act of those who go arrogant and overconfident.
					
					If the U.S. dares mount a pre-emptive strike at the DPRK despite the latter's repeated warnings, it will not be able to escape merciless retaliatory blows.

articles.title: Korean People's Legitimate Right to Protect Its Sovereignty Supported by Russian Party
articles.content:
Korean People's Right to Protect Its Sovereignty Supported by Russian Party
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Party of "Communists of Russia" issued a statement on Feb. 3 in support of the statements of the DPRK National Defence Commission and its Foreign Ministry.
					Defending sovereignty is a just right of the Korean people waging a struggle amid the decades-long siege of the hostile forces, the statement said, and went on:
					
					Most Russians and other people of the world greatly admire the recent achievements made by the DPRK in the nuclear and space development for peaceful purposes.
					
					The imperialists and renegades of socialism are leaving no means untried to tarnish the image of the DPRK.
					
					The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Party of "Communists of Russia" expresses full support and solidarity for the leadership of the DPRK, the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people.
					
					We demand the withdrawal of all sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					Long live the powerful and dignified DPRK!

articles.title: UNSC's "Resolution" against DPRK under Fire by Polish Organization
articles.content:
UNSC's "Resolution" against DPRK under Fire by Polish Organization
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a statement on Feb. 4 denouncing the U.S. and its allies for cooking up the UN Security Council's "resolution" against the DPRK over its satellite launch.
					The statement said:
					
					The DPRK's successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 into orbit was a great jubilee of not only the Korean people but of all progressives aspiring after freedom and equality.
					
					The UNSC's "resolution" is nothing but a fresh attempt to violate the sovereignty of the DPRK, block its development and stifle it.
					
					This shows that the UNSC is nothing but a tool executing the U.S.  policy of inciting enmity toward the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. is resorting to a brigandish logic that those countries following it are allowed to launch satellites but all activities of independent countries should be controlled. This is the height of hypocrisy and double standards.
					
					We demand the UNSC immediately withdraw the "resolution" against the DPRK and apologize for its encroachment upon the DPRK's sovereignty.

articles.title: DPRK's Satellite Launch Supported by Figures of Democratic Congo, Indonesia
articles.content:
DPRK's Satellite Launch Supported by Figures of Democratic Congo, Indonesia
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Figures of Democratic Congo and Indonesia released statements on Feb. 3 and 4 denouncing the UN Security Council's "resolution" against the DPRK over its legitimate satellite launch.
					Jimmy Kikoni, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Democratic Congo, said:
					
					The U.S. and its allies cooked up the illegal UN Security Council "resolution" against the Korean people.
					
					This clearly shows the ulterior intention of the imperialists to monopolize space science and technology and the right to satellite launch.
					
					We fully support the DPRK's launch of satellite for peaceful purposes and will stand firm by the Korean people for defending the sovereignty of the country.
					
					No country has the right to encroach upon the sovereignty of other countries and nations.
					
					Long live the dear respected supreme leader Comrade Kim Jong Un!
					
					Long live the Korean people!
					
					Harinder Singh, secretary general of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia, strongly denounced the UNSC for fabricating the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 under the manipulation of the U.S. He expressed full support for the principled stand of the DPRK.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Venezuela
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Venezuela
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Venezuela on Feb. 5.
					Dr. Yecenia Garcia, chief of the Venezuelan Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					It decided to give wide publicity to the glorious revolutionary career and undying feats of Kim Jong Il and organize diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Preparations for Celebrating Day of Shining Star Brisk Worldwide
articles.content:
Preparations for Celebrating Day of Shining Star Brisk Worldwide
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Preparations are brisk worldwide to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il most significantly and grandly.
					Preparatory committees have been formed in more than 50 countries and regions, including Russia, Indonesia, Mongolia, Iran, Pakistan, Guinea, Democratic Congo, South Africa, Uganda, France, Italy, Poland, Brazil, Mexico, Peru and Ecuador, since the formation of the British preparatory committee for marking the Day of the Shining Star on Jan. 12.
					
					Preparatory committees of the Korean Friendship Association and the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions were also inaugurated.
					
					At the inaugural ceremonies officials of political parties, governments and organizations of relevant countries highly praised the undying feats Kim Jong Il performed for the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence and vowed to work hard to grandly celebrate the Day of the Shining Star as the holiday common to humankind.
					
					Diverse political and cultural events and publicity activities have taken place in different parts of the world to praise and introduce the revolutionary career and undying feats of Kim Jong Il thanks to positive activities of the preparatory committees and ever-deepening  reverence of all people for him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Career Praised by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Career Praised by Foreign Papers
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The Malaysian paper Guang Ming Daily on Feb. 5 carried an article titled "Greatest national holiday of Korean people" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and photos of his birthplace in the Paektusan Secrete Camp and Kimjongilia.
					
					The Korean people are celebrating Feb. 16 as the Day of the Shining Star, the paper said, and went on:
					
					Kim Jong Il was born as the son of guerillas on Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of revolution, and grew up in the crucible of the revolutionary wars at two stages and victoriously led the protracted revolution.
					
					His career was the noble one of the great leader who devoted his all to realizing the plan and desire of President Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea.
					
					Recalling that Kim Jong Il developed the Korean People's Army into the invincible revolutionary armed forces and turned the DPRK into a nuclear weapons state which no enemy dares provoke, the paper stressed that these feats would last forever.
					
					The Bangladeshi paper Industry on Feb. 3 carried an article illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il. 
					
					The article said that the scientific accuracy and truth of socialism have been clarified once again thanks to the energetic ideological and theoretical activities of Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission, and progressive mankind are convinced of the validity of socialism and necessity of its victory.
					
					The paper said that his undying cause is being successfully carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					The Pakistani paper Baluchistan Times on the same day carried an article praising the feats Kim Jong Il performed in accomplishing the cause of national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Mongolia
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" was brought out in booklet in Mongolia.
					The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their lifetime.
					
					It indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to resolutely defend and preserve their ideas and feats and eternally glorify them.
					
					A book releasing ceremony took place at the Mongolian Institute for Strategic Studies on Feb. 5.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work to Be Deeply Studied in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work to Be Deeply Studied in Mongolia
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- L. Khaisandai, chairman of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, said he would more deeply study and disseminate the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work. He said this at the releasing ceremony of Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" held at the Mongolian Institute for Strategic Studies on Feb. 5.
					He noted that he deemed it great honor to publish and release Kim Jong Un's work in Mongolia for the first time.
					
					The work will help Mongolians know better about the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed in depth by leader Kim Jong Il and the steadfast will of Kim Jong Un to successfully carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, he noted.
					
					The Korean people are working world-startling miracles in all fields under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, he stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Concluding Speech Hailed by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Concluding Speech Hailed by British Organizations
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Feb. 4 as regards the enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea held under the guidance of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					The statement said that at the enlarged meeting of the Party Central Military Commission Kim Jong Un made a concluding speech which would serve as important guidelines for developing the Korean People's Army (KPA) into the invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and defending the security and sovereignty of the country.
					
					We positively support his concluding speech, it noted.
					
					His concluding speech serves as important guidelines for bolstering up the military muscle of socialist Korea and a landmark of great significance in the general advance of the Songun revolution, it said.
					
					The KPA is standing on the forefront for defending socialism, it noted.
					
					The U.S. imperialist warmongers and the south Korean puppet forces will not be able to escape a shameful defeat in face of the powerful KPA and Songun Korea led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, it added.

articles.title: Rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Ano Nuevo Lunar 102 (2013) de la Era Juche, fueron depositados los cestos de flores ante las estatuas de bronce de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il levantadas en la capitalina colina Mansu.
					Alli estaba colocado un cesto de flores enviado por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Fueron colocados los cestos, ramos y ramitas de flores en nombre de los organos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios, organos centrales, unidades del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, organismos, empresas, fabricas, granjas y escuelas a todos niveles en la capital.
					
					Tambien fueron puestos los cestos y ramos de flores a nombre de los compatriotas residentes en ultramar. 
					
					Los participantes rindieron homenaje a los grandes Generalisimos. 
					
					Tales ceremonias de homenaje tuvieron lugar igualmente en la Academia Militar General Kim Il Sung, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, la Casa de Creacion Mansudae y otros lugares de la capital y las cabezas provinciales donde estan las estatuas de bronce y los retratos con amplia sonrisa de los Grandes Hombres.
					
					Los oficiales y soldados del EPC, los trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares rindieron homenaje a los Grandes Hombres sin iguales.

articles.title: APRP denuncia represion de banda surcoreana a Ro Su Hui y otra personalidad
articles.content:
APRP denuncia represion de banda surcoreana a Ro Su Hui y otra personalidad
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la direccion nortena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) hizo publica el dia 10 la siguiente declaracion: 
					El pasado dia 8, los titeres surcoreanos sometieron al juicio al vicepresidente de la direccion surena de la APRP, Ro Su Hui, quien habia visitado Pyongyang para expresar las condolencias por el gran duelo nacional, y le sentenciaron los 4 anos de carcel y de suspension de calificacion respectivamente en virtud de la infame "ley de seguridad". 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, encarcelaron al secretario general de la direccion surena de la APRP, quien estaba en cama por el cancer, y le dictaron los 3 anos de carcel y los mismos anos de suspension de calificacion pretextando que el ayudo la "entrada a puertas cerradas". 
					
					Como esta conocido por todos, Ro Su Hui es una personalidad patriotica pro-reunificacion quien vistio Pyongyang con la unanime voluntad de la poblacion surcoreana y participo en el acto de condolencias por los 100 dias del fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					En esa ocasion el compartio la tristeza con los compatriotas de la parte Norte y redoblo la voluntad de contribuir a la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales y a la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					La visita a Pyongyang de Ro fue una conducta justa destinada a expresar como un integrante de la nacion coreana con la conciencia, conviccion y obligacion moral las condolencias por el fallecimiento inesperado del padre de la nacion quien preparo a la nacion coreana las historicas declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur de Corea y abrio la radiante perspectiva de la reunificacion de la patria en el siglo nuevo.
					
					Sin embargo, la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak hizo a los gangsteres arrestar como un animal al vicepresidente Ro cuando el cruzaba la linea divisora central de Phanmunjom para regresar al Sur de Corea en medio de la atencion de la nacion y el resto del mundo. Y le impuso durante 7 meses dolores mentales y fisicos de toda indole y le sentencio la pena dura. 
					
					La direccion nortena de la APRP denuncia severamente la represion al vicepresidente Ro Su Hui y al secretario general de la direccion surena de la APRP calificandola de un insulto intolerable a la aspiracion nacional a la unidad y la reunificacion y de otro desafio a la RPDC. 
					
					La banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak, insatisfecha de sus crimenes de haber interrumpido durante los 5 anos de su mandato el avance de la era de reunificacion independiente del 15 de Junio y haber roto con sus maniobras conflictivas y belicas las relaciones intercoreanas que se mejoraban mediante la reconciliacion y la cooperacion, se desespera por agravar la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana cuestionando el legitimo lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos de la RPDC. 
					
					Los habitantes de distintos estratos del Sur de Corea, indignados por los tremendos crimenes de la banda de Lee, intensifican la lucha contra las maniobras fratricidas de la horda de Lee. 
					
					La pena severa, aplicada al vicepresidente Ro Su Hui y otros miembros de la entidad del movimiento por la reunificacion, quienes libraron las actividades justas para la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales y la reunificacion de la patria, parte de la intencion de crear el ambiente represivo en la sociedad surcoreana para impedir el creciente clima de reunificacion pro-Norte e inculcar la conciencia de confrontacion fratricida. 
					
					Toda la nacion coreana no tolerara jamas los crimenes anti-eticos y anti-reunificacion de la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak. 
					
					Los maniacos de confrontacion fratricida no pueden eludir el severo castigo de la historia y la nacion aunque se retiren del poder. 
					
					Las autoridades titeres surcoreanas deben abolir la infame "ley de seguridad" y poner inmediatamente en libertad a las personalidades patrioticas pro-reunificacion incluso el vicepresidente Ro Su Hui. 
					
					Exhortamos a las entidades y habitantes de distintos estratos del Sur de Corea a levantarse como un solo hombre en la lucha pannacional por eliminar completamente en este territorio a la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak que hace ultimos esfuerzos desesperados recurriendo a la politica fascista y a la confrontacion fratricida y lograr la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia supremacia militar de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia supremacia militar de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, Estados Unidos realizo la prueba de tercera etapa de misil interceptor en una base aerea de California y lo dio a la publicidad junto con las imagenes. 
					Esto demuestra que EE.UU. intenta utilizar la prueba de misil interceptor para ejercer la amenaza militar a otro pais y elevar al maximo su eficiencia. 
					
					Revela el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este lunes y continua:
					
					Bajo el rotulo de la supuesta "amenaza de misil" de alguien, EE.UU. actua tenazmente para realizar con la fuerza su estrategia de dominio al mundo entero. 
					
					Lo principal en esta estrategia norteamericana es mantener su supremacia en la esfera de armas de ataque estrategico y a base de ello, ampliar la disposicion de ataque preventivo 
					
					La esencia de la prueba de misil interceptor de EE.UU. reside en neutralizar el disuasivo de otros paises en el dominio de armas de ataque estrategico y preparar la capacidad de ataque preventivo en cualquier momento y asi controlar a su antojo todo el mundo. 
					
					En estos dias, el intento de ataque preventivo de EE.UU. contra otros paises se amplia a diferentes esferas con aspecto mas peligroso. 
					
					Lo muestra el hecho de que EE.UU. pretende desarrollar la comandancia cibernetica como una fuerza militar dotada de capacidad de ataque. 
					
					Como vemos, EE.UU. se vale de todos los medios y metodos para tomar la supremacia militar y se desespera cada dia mas por el respecto.
					
					EE.UU. quiere derrocar la RPDC con la fuerza y el despotismo, pero en vano. 
					
					Si el imperio asesta el golpe preventivo contra la RPDC pese a la reiterada advertencia de ella, no podra evadir el ataque de venganza implacable.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia simulacro militar EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia simulacro militar EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- Recientemente, el submarino nuclear "San Francisco" adscrito a la 11a flotilla norteamericana y el crucero Aegis "Shiloh", desarrollaron el entrenamiento combinado antisubmarino con el ejercito titere surcoreano.
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que el imperio yanqui dio a la publicidad la parte interna de ese submarino equipado con misiles cruceros "Tomahawk".
					
					En su comentario individual insertado este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun condena que el presente movimiento militar del imperio es la expresion de su intento y abierta amenaza militar de agredir a la Corea socialista movilizando todos los medios y metodos en el "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana, y prosigue:
					
					Coincidiendo con el presente simulacro, el imperio despacho hacia las aguas de la Peninsula Coreana hasta el portaaviones perteneciente a la 7a flota norteamericana.
					
					La realidad comprueba que llega a la realidad el peligroso intento de los yanquis de estallar a toda costa la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Los belicistas justifican sus ejercicios belicos hablando con imprudencia de la "posibilidad de provocacion" de alguien y de "mensaje de fuerte advertencia".
					
					El alboroto militar del imperio es la demostracion de la cobardia y megalomania de los atemorizados ante la declaracion de la RPDC de entrar en el enfrentamiento total frente al imperio que instigo al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU a aprobar la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC cuestionando el lanzamiento de satelite coreano con fines pacificos.
					
					El ejercito y pueblo coreanos nunca se asustaran ante esa "manifestacion militar".
					
					Si el imperio se atreve a provocar la guerra menospreciando al ejercito y pueblo coreanos, estos aniquilaran a los agresores sin perder la oportunidad de oro.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun advierte al traidor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun advierte al traidor Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- Recientemente, el Ministerio de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea anuncio abiertamente que se incluira el ideal de "ataque preventivo" en su "estrategia disuasoria sobre el nuclear del Norte" con Estados Unidos diciendo del "desarrollo de la estrategia detallada, realista y cierta" frente a la supuesta "amenaza nuclear real del Norte (de Corea)". 
					Jong Sung Jo, jefe de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor del ejercito titere, disparato que "lanzara el ataque preventivo aunque se produzca la guerra" en el caso de que haya el "indicio de la ofensiva nuclear" de alguien.
					
					En su comentario individual difundido este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que tales disparates muestran claramente que la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak tomo como un hecho consumado el ataque preventivo nuclear al Norte y activa el movimiento para llevar a la practica su intencion de agredir al Norte en contubernio con el imperio, y prosigue:
					
					Acelerando el desarrollo y la ubicacion de misil balistico con 800km de alcance capaz de atacar toda la extension de la RPDC, los titeres promueven el emplazamiento de misil crucero buque-tierra con 500km de alcance para el destructor Aegis y el otro aire-tierra de largo alcance para el uso de cazabombarderos.
					
					Mencionando sobre la "capacidad independiente para la vigilancia sobre el Norte", intentan invertir fabulosos fondos para disponer del satelite de reconocimiento para vigilar las instalaciones importantes enclavadas en la retaguardia del Norte.
					
					Todas sus palabras no pasan de ser una sofisteria para encubrir sus maniobras hostiles anti-RPDC.
					
					Es ridiculo el que esos tipejos hacen esfuerzos desesperados para lanzar el ataque preventivo a la RPDC en connivencia con su amo EE.UU. 
					
					El "ataque preventivo" de los belicistas surcoreanos les traera solo el arruinamiento final.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza campana anti-RPDC de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza campana anti-RPDC de Japon
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- En la 21a reunion anual del Forum Parlamentario Asia-Pacifico, los parlamentarios japoneses presentaron el "proyecto de resolucion" cuestionando el lanzamiento del satelite artificial de la Tierra de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como "perturbacion de la paz y seguridad de toda la region y violacion de la resolucion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU". 
					Lo mas ridiculo del caso es que ellos insistieron en incluir en ese "proyecto" los temas de "averiguacion del problema de secuestro" y "no proliferacion de armas de exterminio masivo". 
					
					El hecho muestra que pueriles son los reaccionarios japoneses que rogaron a los parlamentarios de otros paises apoyar su "proyecto de resolucion". 
					
					Revelo el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 10 y continuo:
					
					Los gobernantes reaccionarios del pais isleno tienen celos de los exitos de otros paises. 
					
					No tenemos la necesidad de explicar a los censuradores con mal juicio el caracter pacifico del lanzamiento del satelite de nuestro pais, porque ya esta aclarado claramente lo todo en las declaraciones del Comite de Defensa Nacional y del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y que los reaccionarios japoneses no tienen la capacidad de comprenderlas. 
					
					Pero, nos vimos obligados a revelar la verdadera intencion del pais isleno. 
					
					Hace poco, Japon volvio a lanzar un satelite de reconocimiento. 
					
					Es ilogico que lo haga ese pais criminal de guerra y contraviene a los tratados universales que permiten utilizar el espacio universal con fines pacificos.
					
					Japon intenta encubrir sus maniobras de conversion en la potencia militar y manifestar la "diplomacia de principios" mediante la creacion del ambiente de hostilidad a la RPDC, pero no puede liberarse de su situacion miserable igual a una marioneta manipulada por EE.UU.
